1451.T.summary: KHC Ltd. operates in construction and real estate businesses in Japan. It provides support for home building and housing acquisition for custom-built homes. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Akashi, Japan. KHC Ltd. is a subsidiary of Japan Asia Group Limited.

1766.T.summary: Token Corporation operates as a construction company in Japan. It is involved in the design, construction, operation, and management of apartment buildings and rental condominiums; and construction of general and commercial lease properties. The company also provides tenant recruitment and property management services for rental apartments, condominiums, and retail outlets; and real estate agency services. In addition, it engages in the hotel, advertising, and information businesses. Token Corporation was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

1814.T.summary: Daisue Construction Co., Ltd. engages in the construction and real estate businesses in Japan. It is involved in the construction of condominiums; and buildings for offices, distribution warehouses, factories, medical care, ceremonial occasions, etc. The company also engages in the repair, extension, and renovation of existing buildings. In addition, it is involved in the real estate management, general worker dispatch, employment placement, security, construction contracting, lots and transaction building, non-life insurance agency, and coin parking businesses, as well as offers architect, civil engineering construction, and consulting services. The company was founded in 1937 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

1847.T.summary: Ichiken Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business in Japan. The company rents and leases buildings; develops housing facilities; and involved in the urban environment projects. It also plans, designs, develops, constructs, administrates, and supervises commercial facilities and stores. The company was formerly known as Daiichi Kensetsu Corporation Ltd. and changed its name to Ichiken Co., Ltd. in 1989. Ichiken Co., Ltd. was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

1925.T.summary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

2981.T.summary: Landix Inc. engages in the real estate matching/consulting, custom housing matching/consulting, real estate development, and real estate tech platform development/operation businesses in Japan. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

2983.T.summary: Arr Planner Co., Ltd. engages in the custom-built housing and real estate businesses in Japan. It builds and sells customized homes; and new detached houses. The company also offers remodeling and renovation, exterior, housing rental, used house regeneration, and commercial architectural design services. In addition, it provides real estate property buying, selling, and brokerage services. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

3299.T.summary: MUGEN ESTATE Co.,Ltd. purchases and resells used real estate properties in Japan. It operates through Real Estate Trading Business, and Real Estate Leasing and Other Business segments. The company's property portfolio includes residential-type and investment-type properties, including condominiums, office blocks, buildings, and apartments; and detached houses. It is also involved in property leasing; interior and exterior refurbishment; property brokerage; and property management businesses. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

3480.T.summary: J.S.B.Co.,Ltd. engages in the planning, development, mediation, and management of condominiums in Japan. The company plans, develops, and operates student condominiums, halls, and dormitories; and houses for elderly. It also engages in the condominium and building operation and management; property management; electricity/firefighting equipment management; real estate brokerage; operation of Japanese language school; home care support, home-visit care, and day care business; welfare equipment rental business; cafeteria business; security product development; and rental of furniture and home appliances. In addition, the company offers cleaning and repair services; employment seminars and forum management; human resources services; land development consulting; and rent liability guarantee services. Further, it is involved in the non-life insurance agency business; publication of housing information magazines, such as Student Boarding House Yearbook, Student Mansion Book, and Smile Age; information provision through the Internet; and peripheral device sales and maintenance management for Internet use. J.S.B.Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

5280.T.summary: Yoshicon Co.,Ltd. engages in the purchase, sale, leasing, brokerage, management, and development of real estate properties. The company also provides design and construction supervision services for civil engineering and construction works; and sells research, patent, utility model and design, and trust beneficiaries attracting rights. In addition, it is involved in the investment advisory, power sales, parking lot operation management, solar operation management, and commercial facility factory activities; and processes and sells building and environmental materials. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Shizuoka, Japan.

8886.T.summary: Wood Friends Co.,Ltd. plans, develops, and sells real estate properties in Japan. The company designs, constructs, sells, and services wood houses and residential condominium; and provides real estate brokerage and house consultancy services. It is also involved in the land procurement business. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Nagoya, Japan.

8887.T.summary: Riberesute Corporation engages in real estate and construction businesses in Japan. It operates through Development Business, Construction Business, Real Estate Sales Business, and Other Business segments. The Development Business segment develops and sells condominiums, business hotels, etc. The Construction Business segment is engaged in the construction of custom-built houses and formwork carpentry. The Real Estate Sales Business segment engages in real estate sales. The Other Business segment provides brokerage and management of rental housing and brokerage of real estate. Riberesute Corporation was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Soka, Japan.

DWAHF.summary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

DWH.F.summary: Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the construction business worldwide. It operates through Single-Family Houses; Rental Housing; Condominiums; Existing Homes; Commercial Facilities; Logistics, Business and Corporate Facilities; and Other Businesses segments. The company constructs single-family houses; rents houses; develops, manages, and sells condominiums; purchases, renovates, and resells existing homes; develops commercial facilities; develops and constructs logistics, business, and corporate facilities; and provides real estate agency services. It also manufactures steel and timber housing parts; offers ground survey and reinforcement services; and constructs retail and wholesale, medical and nursing care, office and factory, urban development and industrial park, energy, environmental greening, agriculture, parking and carsharing, and public-private partnership facilities. In addition, the company operates resort hotels and golf courses, business and city hotels, fitness clubs and aesthetic salons, and home centers; provides robotics technologies for use in hospitals, care facilities, factories, and construction sites; manages private homes for the elderly and assisted-living residential facilities for seniors; and offers parking, advertising, travel agency, information technology, and credit card and insurance agency services. Daiwa House Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

TDI.F.summary: Takara Leben Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate business in Japan. It plans, designs, develops, and sells condominiums and single unit houses mainly under the LEBEN brand names. The company engages in the electric power generation business; and condominium management services. In addition, it is involved in the real estate sales, agency, distribution, and brokerage; construction activities; renewal resale and loan collection; and investment management, type II financial instruments services, investment advisory and agency, and REIT's asset management businesses. The company was formerly known as Takara Komuten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Takara Leben Co., Ltd. in 2000. Takara Leben Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
